title: Hey Duggee - Frog
description: Hey Duggee is one of my 1-year-olds favourite shows at the moment. Having already made him Duggee from an existing pattern, I thouhgt which character I'd like to do next. This cute frog was an obvious choise.
cardDescription: Hey Duggee is one of my 1-year-olds favourite shows at the moment. So I wanted to make him this cute frog.

content.content: Finished size of the frog is about 10cm x 10cm

content: Green, white and black worsted weight yarns

content.content: Frog is shaped as a tetrahedron in which all four faces are equilateral triangles. You could crochet four triangles and sew them together, but I chose to do them all in one go.

content: ch 2, 2 sc to 2nd ch from hook, turn [2]

content.content: Don't fasten off, but continue to make the second triangle.

content: ch, going down the side of the triangle (24 sc blo), turn [24]

content.content: Repeat second triangle but on first row, sc to flo, not blo. This way all seams bend the same way. Dont't fasten off.
If you did the triangles the same way I did, beginning tip and ending tip will match each other when forming the tetrahedron
Fold the triangles so that it forms a tetrahedron. Hold two triangle edges together.

content: ch, slst going through loops from both triangles (front loop from top triangle and back loop from bottom triangle) to form crisp edges.

content.content: Repeat previous step for the second seam. Fasten off.
Stuff the frog with fiber fill. Not too full so tetrahedron won't loose its shape.
Attach new green yarn and close the last seam using the same method as the other two.
Fasten off. Leave a long tail for sewing. Sew the hole shut and slip the remaining yarn through the eye so that it comes out from the middle of the two eyes. You can use that to sew it to the body.
Position the black dots so that eyes look a bit inwards and sew in place.
Choose a side from the tetrahedron body where stiches are horizontal. Place the eyes so that the tip of the tetrahedron is just behing them. Sew tightly in place.

content.alt: Crochet tetrahedron frog with huge eyes
